text: Bruce Martin Mathison (born April 25, 1959) is a former American football quarterback who played in the NFL for the San Diego Chargers (two stints), Buffalo Bills, and the Seattle Seahawks. He played college football at the University of Nebraska. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:Nebraska Cornhuskers football players Category:Sportspeople from Superior, Wisconsin Category:Players of American football from Wisconsin Category:National Football League replacement players
title: Bruce Mathison
